title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.9.36 | 04-05-2022
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम ज्ञान तिमिरान धस्या ज्ञानान जनिषलाकया चक्षरुन् मीलितं येना धस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः
नमा ओम विष्णु पादाया कृष्ण प्रेष्ठाय भूतले श्रीमते भक्ति वेदान्त स्वामिन् नितिनामिने
नमस्ते सारस्वते देवे गौवरवाणी प्रचारिने निर्विशेशा शुन्यवादी पास्चात्यदेशतारिने
जय श्री कृष्ण चैतन्या प्रभूलित्यानन्दा श्री अद्वैत गदाधरा शिवासाधी गौवरभक्त वृन्दा
हरे कृष्णा हरे कृष्णा कृष्ण कृष्णा हरे हरे हरे राम हरे रामा राम रामा हरे हरे
ओम नमो भगवते वासु देवाया नारायणम नमस्कृत्या नरम्चैवनरोत्तमं देवीम सरस्वतीम व्यासं ततो जयमुदी रयेत।
इन देशन विल बिस्कर्सिंग फ्राम दे तर्टिसिक्स्थ वर्स अब दे नाइन्चेप्र विपर्स्ट केटौ श्रीमद्भगवत।
व्यवहित पृतना मुखं निरीक्ष्या स्वजन वधाद्विमुखस्य दोष बुद्ध्या कुमति महरद आत्मविद्यायाह चरणरति परमस्यतस्य मेंस्तू

The meaning of this verse is, when Arjuna was seemingly polluted by ignorance upon observing the soldiers and commanders before him on the battlefield, the Lord eradicated his ignorance by delivering transcendental knowledge.
May his lotus feet always remain the object of my attraction.
So this prayer by Bhishmadeva refers to Arjuna's bewilderment upon seeing the evidence.
The enemy at the beginning of the battle of Kurukshetra, when Krishna eradicated Arjuna's ignorance by speaking Bhagavad Gita.
So directly it is a reference to Krishna instructing Arjuna in the subject matter of Bhagavad Gita.
So Srila Prabhupada explains in the purport,
The kings and the commanders were to stand in the front of the fighting soldiers.
They are the system of actual fighting.
The kings and commanders were not so-called presidents or ministers of defense as they are today.
Prabhupada is comparing the Vedic times when the Kshatriyas with the proper spirit, they would execute their duties boldly, courageously, chivalrously.
Unlike the modern-day defense ministers or presidents, head of state, who never go to a battlefield to fight or defend the country.
They simply sit in closed offices, secure offices and issue commands.
They would not stay home while the poor soldiers or mercenaries were fighting face to face.
This is not the case with the Kshatriyas like Arjuna.
Bhishma, all of them fought in the front line.
The generals and the commanders were in the front.
This may be the regulation of modern democracy.
But when actual monarchy was prevailing, the monarchs were not cowards elected without consideration of qualifications.
Nowadays, when we elect a monarch, we elect a monarch.
We don't check the qualification of the person who is elected or the person who is able to face the enemy in a battle.
Whereas in the former times, a Kshatriya was not a Kshatriya for namesake.
He was actually bold, he was brave, he was ready to lay down his life for protecting the citizens in a battle.
As it was evident from the battlefield of Kurukshetra, all the executive heads of both parties like Drona, Bhishma, Arjuna and Duryodhana were not sleeping.
All of them were actual participants in the fighting.
All of them were actual participants in the fighting, which was selected to be executed at a place of war.
All of them were actual participants in the fighting, which was selected to be executed at a place of war.
All of them were actual participants in the fighting, which was selected to be executed at a place of war.
